description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Introduction to the History of Poetry in Scotland from the beginning of the thirteenth century to the present time; with a conversation on Scotish song ... To which are subjoined Sangs of the Lowlands of Scotland ... With characteristic designs, composed and engraved by ... David Allan" Author: CAMPBELL, Alexander - Musician and Poet Contributor: ALLAN, David - of Alloa Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 130.d.7.", "British Library HMNTS 642.k.16.", "British Library HMNTS G.925." Page: 399 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1798 Publisher: Andrew Foulis Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000584143 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
